section.title: Description
section.p: The organism identified as being present within a specimen sample. "Organism" as used here is not the full spectrum of possible living things, but rather is limited to a member of the following: Bacteria, Fungus, Mycobacterium, Parasite, or Virus.

stentry.p:
The organism identified. Since this unique identifier is a coded element, it contains both a code and a display name.

Could be Gram Positive Bacilli,
